Uses of Interface
fast3d.complex.light.Illuminatable

  • Packages that use Illuminatable 
    Package Description
    fast3d.complex  
    fast3d.complex.light  
    fast3d.graphics  
    fast3d.renderables  

    • Uses of Illuminatable in fast3d.complex

      Classes in fast3d.complex that implement Illuminatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Group
      a class to combine multiple triangles
      the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by raytracing, on call of render nothing happens
      note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the triangles to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
      a group is just a way of organizing data for a scenery or an object, considering the model-view-controller model it is requested to used addToUniverse() instead of adding this to a universe
      hint: although the contained Renderables can build an 3d-object, they can be independent
      class  Object
      a class to combine multiple groups
      the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by ray tracing
      note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the groups to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
      although the contained groups can be part of a 3d-object, they can be independent
      class  Scene
      a class to combine multiple Objects
      the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by ray tracing
      note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the objects to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
      although the contained objects can be part of a stringent 3d-scenery, they can be independent

    • Uses of Illuminatable in fast3d.complex.light

      Methods in fast3d.complex.light with parameters of type Illuminatable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3d PointLight.directionOfLight(Illuminatable r)
      for every Illuminatable in space, this will be different because of it's relative position to this light-source
      abstract Vector3d ObstructableLight.directionOfLight(Illuminatable l)
      any obstructable light has to have a direction of it's light-rays
      Vector3d DirectionalLight.directionOfLight(Illuminatable l) 
      Color SpecularLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color PointLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      abstract Color ObstructableLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color Light.illuminate(Illuminatable illum)
      calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;
      the visible color is the color of the pixels on the screen for the given renderable
      Color DirectionalLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color AmbientLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      java.util.Hashtable<Renderable,Vector3d> ObstructableLight.obstructings(Illuminatable l)
      should be used by illuminate(Illuminatable) to determine whether the Illuminatable to currently illuminate lays in the shadow of another

    • Uses of Illuminatable in fast3d.graphics

      Methods in fast3d.graphics with parameters of type Illuminatable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Graphics3d.illuminateSurface(Illuminatable illum)
      does the lighting calculation for any used light and combines them to the visible color for the given surface
      static Color Graphics3d.illuminateSurface(Illuminatable illum, Light... lights)
      does the lighting calculation for any given light and combines them to the visible color for the given surface

    • Uses of Illuminatable in fast3d.renderables

      Classes in fast3d.renderables that implement Illuminatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdvTriangle
      an advanced version of triangle3d that is illuminatable with any built-in light
      getColor() returns the current visible color
